name: 陳銘崑
objective:
本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.
schedule:
Week 1 : 課程說明與評分
Week 2 : 作業管理概論 
Week 3 : Supply Chain Strategy /Suppy Chain Operations Reference Model (SCOR)
Week 4 : What is 6 Sigma ? What is Lean Production                  
Week 5 : What is AGILE Manufacturing?
Week 6 : 專題計畫書報告
Week 7 : TOYOTA Production System; Kanban Production
Week 8：Bullwhip Effect - Supply Chain Management: The Beer Game
Week 9：What is Logistics Management Definition & Importance in Supply Chain/                     
Week 10 : Global Supply Chain Management /VMI
Week 11 : Logistics Service Levels 1PL - 5 PL 
Week 12：專題計劃進度報告
Week 13：CPFR / Collaborative Planning: A Case Study
Week 14：Supply Chain Management of ZARA
Week 15：McDonalds Supply Chain
Week 16: Walmart Supply Chain
Week 17: Apple Supply Chain  
Week 18: 專題計劃期末報告
scorePolicy:
課堂報告: 30%
課中參與 (思考並參與討論): 30%
專題計畫: 40%
